title: Business Analyst - Payments
description:
Job Description


Work experience as a BA on Payments, Internal funds transfer, external funds transfer same currency, cross currency funds transfer, Payment fees and charges, Swift messaging, ISO messages, Deposits, loans etc.
Must have worked in Software development projects / companies as BA with Good understanding of ISO messages / Swift payment messages like MT103 MT202 formats etc.
Mandatory to have understanding of technologies. e.g. How the transaction parameters or values are mapped or the approach to connect to end points, understand the technical deliverables.
Must have good understanding on Business rules / validations like MIFT, Real time balance, Memo Posting, First time beneficiary, Anti money laundering, Advice to customer etc.
Good analytical and Logical skills
Should have good communication skills to connect with stakeholders
Should be proactive and should be able to think out of the box
Show more
